name: Restart (N0vaKnight)
description:
The way to beat this game is by restarting?! Help out a company who is testing a strange way of freezing computerized objects in time. Freeze objects in time and restart through levels to solve the 6 short but sweet puzzles in the game!

Controls:

A/D - Move

Space - Jump

Click - Freeze

F - Unfreeze

R - Restart

All code, assets, and sounds were made in a week's time frame for the Brackeys Game Jam

UI sprites were made by Tehabruh

Music was made by Curruff

Narrator was voiced by NovaKnight
